title: New unit in West Loop with washer dryer and private balcony
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Interested in this property?  Click on: Reply to this listing for more information  ** if you are texting us, please include the link to the listing so we can identify what you are inquiring on    Phenomenal new building located in the West Loop just off of the Fulton District area in the heart of Chicago.  Take advantage of this convertible unit. Cats & dogs are ok. Garage parking extra.   Building features; -24 hour door staff -Private rooftop fitness facility -Private rooftop pool and sundeck with fire pits tvs and lounge areas -Private resident lounge -Private dog run and indoor pet wash station -Free common area wi fi -Extra storage, bike storage and garage parking available  Apartment features: -New wide plank hardwood floors -Washer/dryer -Private balcony -Totally modern kitchen and bathrooms -9' ceilings  Velocity Apartment Group  312-253-7403 *****For faster response from one of our Agents, please provide your cell phone number, move date and email address when inquiring.  Thank you.  Availability and pricing may change at any time without notice. Ads subject to errors and omissions. Please contact agent for additional questions and information.  Interested in this property? Click REPLY above and email us  ** if you are texting us, please include the link to the listing so we can identify what you are inquiring on
